full_summary:
===============

**Tender Announcement: Two Level 3 Programmer/Software Developers**

**Reference Number:** CB-496134196687
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 2023-01140

**Publication Date:** April 24, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** May 9, 2023, at 14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** May 9, 2023

**Expected Contract Start Date:** May 15, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** June 30, 2024

**Tender Status:** Expired

**Procurement Overview:**

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) Operations Branch is seeking the services of two (2) Level 3 Programmer/Software Developers to support the continuity and future development of National MS Access Databases and other data/system initiatives. The selected candidates will be responsible for:

* Analysis and documentation of functional requirements
* Design and development of coding (Visual Basic, MS Access, SharePoint, Power Applications)
* Implementation of changes to applications

**Eligibility:**

This tender is open exclusively to Supply Arrangement (SA) holders who have qualified under Tier 1 (Remote/Virtual Access) for services in the following category:

* Two (2) Level 3 Programmer/Software Developers

**Procurement Method:**

The procurement method is competitive-selective tendering with a selection criterion of lowest price.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact:

* Carol Trottier, [carol.trottier@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:carol.trottier@inspection.gc.ca), (613) 291-2857

**Tender Documents:**

The tender notice and supporting documents are available on the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website:

* [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4961/2023-01140_-_tbips_npp_%28en.pdf)
* [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4961/2023-01140_-_tbips---npp-%28fr_0.pdf)
